LightningComponentBundle.description: This component is used to display the corporate request form in the community. Which is configured and created internally by the nfCorporateFormEdito LWC

property.name: recordTypeName
property.label: Record Type Name:
property.description: Enter the label name of the record type to use when creating a case for this. This should not be changed, unless a differnent record type has to be used and approved

property.name: attachmentsInstructions
property.label: Attachement Instructions:
property.default: Attach up to 5 files: If you have any attachments to add to your submission (such as photos, receipts, or screenshots), please attach up to 5 files so we can further assist you. Should a case require additional information, you may be asked to provide that at a later time.

property.name: instructions
property.label: Instructions Label:
property.default: Please tell us more about your inquiry using the form below and click to submit your information.

property.name: maxFilesInsertedLabel
property.label: Max Files Label:
property.description: The message to post when the max number of files have been inserted

property.name: maxFilesInsertedSubinstructions
property.label: Max Files Error Instructions:
property.description: This is the second line on the toast message
property.default: Attach up to 5 files: If you have any attachments to add to your submission.
